overview: Kayden Kross was always a star. We just didn't know it. And then we found each other. We rushed her to the set. And she jumped on Manuel Ferrara like a seasoned pro. There's a word for that: hot. Vivid presents our brand new contract star Kayden Kross in her first movie ever. She will be major. But she'll be yours first.
title: Kayden's First Time
